item.title: Hackers Are Using Google To Steal Microsoft Passwords
item.description: New research reveals how hackers are using Google to attack Microsoft passwords. Here’s everything you need to know and do.

item.title: Quantum Supremacy: The GPT-1 Moment Of Computing's Next Revolution
item.description: If quantum is three to five years behind AI in technology development, is 2025 the equivalent of what 2022 was for AI?

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Omits Important Android Feature, Report Claims
item.description: Google’s new Android Linux Terminal app could let you run Linux apps on your smartphone, but not on Samsung devices.

item.title: The Evolving Strategic Security Role Of The Chief Data Officer
item.description: Through my work, I’ve observed a notable shift in the responsibilities of chief data officers (CDOs) in Latin America.
